description: Dames en heer, stap rechts omhoog! Feest uw ogen op de  griezeligste portemonnee in stad - de Loungefly Nightmare Before Christmas Final Frame Zip Around Wallet. If you're a die-hard fan of Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas, then this accessory is simply meant to be in your possession. It's not just a wallet, it's a tribute to the iconic images from the movie that have stolen our hearts and souls. Let's take a closer look, shall we?On the front of the wallet, we have Jack Skellington and Sally romantically standing on Spiral Hill beneath a full moon. It's certainly a breathtaking sight that is sure to have you swooning and reaching for your wallet in admiration. But the magic doesn't stop there - on the back, we have the image of Jack falling through a spiral of snowflakes. It's like a mini rollercoaster ride in your handbag! With this wallet, you'll be carrying around a piece of cinema history that is sure to spark conversations and envy wherever you go.Now, let's talk practicality. This wistfully romantic accessory may be beautiful, but it's also functional. It boasts four slots for holding cards and a clear slot for holding ID. Huzzah! No more digging around in your bag for your ID at the bar. Plus, it has plenty of room to store all your tricks and treats. You never know when you might need to whip out a spare set of fangs, right?But wait, there's more! This wallet is made of vegan leather (polyurethane), which means you can look fabulous and be ethically conscious of your fashion choices. It also has sturdy metal hardware and features printed details. And let's not forget the coordinating inside lining. It's the little details that count, folks. This wallet is an officially licensed Disney product, so you can rest assured that you're getting the real deal.Seriously, what are you waiting for? Don't let this spooktacular accessory slip through your fingers like a ghost in the night. Get your hands on the LoungeflyNightmare Before Christmas Final Frame Zip Around Wallet vandaag! - Iconische afbeeldingen van Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas tot leven gebracht - Vier sleuven voor kaarten en een doorzichtige sleuf voor ID- Gemaakt van veganistisch leer (polyurethaan) en heeft stevige metalen hardware- Bijpassende binnenvoering - Een officieel gelicentieerd Disney-product.
